events.name: onAction
events.description: Handler that is called when an item is selected.
events.description_zh: 选择项时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onSelectionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.
events.description_zh: 在所选内容更改时调用的处理程序。

:children.description: The children to render. Usually a list of `ListboxItem` or `ListboxSection`
:children.description_zh: 要呈现的子项。通常是“ListboxItem”或“ListboxSection”的列表

:items.description_zh: 集合中的 Item 对象。（动态）

variant.type: solid / bordered / light / flat / faded / shadow

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
selectionMode.description_zh: 集合中允许的选择类型。

:selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
:selectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中当前选定的键（受控）。

:disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.
:disabledKeys.description_zh: 已禁用的项目键。无法选择、聚焦这些项目或以其他方式与之交互。

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
defaultSelectedKeys.description_zh: 集合中初始选择的键（不受控制）。

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.

autoFocus.description: Where the focus should be set.

disableAnimation.description: Whether to disable the animation of the listbox items.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否禁用列表框项的动画。

itemClasses.description: Allows to set custom class names for the listbox item slots.
itemClasses.description_zh: 允许为列表框项槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main wrapper for the listbox component. This slot wraps the topContent, bottomContent and the list slot.
slots.description_zh: 列表框组件的主包装器。此槽包装 topContent、bottomContent 和列表槽。

slots.name: list
slots.description: The slot for the listbox component. You can see this slot as the ul slot.
slots.description_zh: 列表框组件的槽。您可以将此插槽视为 ul 插槽。

slots.name: emptyContent
slots.description: The slot content to display when the collection is empty.
slots.description_zh: 集合为空时要显示的槽内容。
